DescriptionReporting to the Vice President of Strategic Technologies Group, the successful candidate will contribute to and drive our AI Technologies and Markets Research. The role requires a proactive thought leader able to gather first-hand intelligence from the industry and work as a part of an ambitious team to produce premium quantitative and qualitative analysis of AI market and enabling technologies.Specific responsibilities include: Author syndicated research reports, market forecasts, and articles covering AI technologies and markets.
Work on custom research and consulting projects, providing leadership on approach and methodology.
Engage and maintain strong relationships with key industry players at the research and commercial levels.
Represent ABI Research as a key industry expert in AI.
Provide existing clients with strategic advice and insights on AI market development and trends.
Help to develop and maintain our AI research, providing guidance and input based on client’s needs and industry trends.
Maintain a high industry profile by participating in industry events, delivering webinars, interacting with the press, and being active on social media (e.g., LinkedIn and Twitter).
Support sales and business development by preparing customer-specific analyses and participating in key meetings with clients, prospects, and partners.
Support and share expertise with other team members, including the marketing team and other ABI Research analysts. The ideal candidate will have the following skills: Intellectual curiosity, passion, and enthusiasm for technology innovation are musts for this role.
Eloquent and outstanding written and verbal communication skills.
Ambitious with the ability to drive project agendas, including research and commercial activities.
Excellent quantitative and qualitative analytical skills.
People-oriented and possess the willingness to develop close relationships with existing and potential clients.
Advanced skills in manipulating Excel databases and data analytics.
Experience in product management, new product development, product marketing, market research, or industry analysis is strongly preferred.
Familiarity with data science, including AI, Machine Learning and related technologies is highly desirable.
Background in computer science, electronics, or automation is preferred. LocationABI Research is fully remote in the U.S., with physical offices in the U.K. and Singapore.About ABI ResearchABI Research is a forward-thinking, fast-paced company specializing in the technologies of tomorrow. ABI is family-friendly with locations throughout the United States, United Kingdom, and Singapore. Additionally, we have many employees who work remotely from home either full-time or part of the time. ABI offers competitive compensation along with an extremely generous benefit and vacation package in addition to rewarding achievement by promoting within. Be part of a global team of thought leaders and influencers and apply today!
